meanings.definition: A baked Italian dish consisting of layers of pasta, cheese, and meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious lasagne for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: I ordered lasagne at the Italian restaurant for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The lasagne at the potluck disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a warm slice of lasagne.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of lasagne filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A sheet of pasta used in making lasagne.
meanings.sent1: I carefully placed the lasagne on the baking tray.
meanings.sent2: The lasagne sheets were perfectly cooked and ready to assemble.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the lasagne sheets on the counter.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight shone on the lasagne sheets, creating a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully layered the lasagne sheets with cheese and sauce.
